title: Handle a Community Guideline Violation
description: A driver reports a rider for unprofessional behavior that violates the platform's community guidelines.

tasks.description: Receive a report from a driver about a rider's behavior on a specific trip.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report is logged against the rider's account.

tasks.description: Review the driver's report and the rider's account history for any past incidents.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent finds this is the third such complaint against this rider.

tasks.description: Based on the repeated violations, the agent decides to permanently deactivate the rider's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: A decision is made based on policy.

tasks.description: The rider's account is deactivated, and they are sent a notification explaining the reason.
tasks.expected_outcome: The rider is removed from the platform.
